DOC.brief_summary: To monitor safety profile effectiveness Vahelva Respimat Korean patient COPD routine clinical practice set
DOC.brief_title: Vahelva Respimat Regulatory Post-marketing Surveillance Korean Patients With Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Patients start Vahelva Respimat accordance approve label Korea Age > = 18 year enrolment Patients sign data release consent form Exclusion criterion : Patients hypersensitivity Vahelva Respimat excipients . Patients history hypersensitivity atropine derivative ( e.g . ipratropium , oxitropium , glycopyrronium , clidinium , umeclidinium ) Patients asthma Current participation clinical trial
